blogPost.excerpt: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
blogPost.body: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
blogPost.title: macOS 11 Big Sur UI Kit - The most detailed and accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch 💎
blogPost.author: Alexander Käßner

localize.description: 为Sketch获得令人难以置信的详细和最准确的macOS UI Kit。该库加载了数百种组件、颜色和文本样式。可以说是最快的方式来开始你的Mac应用设计。
localize.tagline: 最详细、最准确的macOS用户界面工具包，适用于Sketch💎。

localize.description: 爲Sketch獲得令人難以置信的詳細和最準確的macOS UI Kit。該庫加載了數百種組件、顏色和文本樣式。可以說是最快的方式來開始你的Mac應用設計。
localize.tagline: 最詳細、最準確的macOS用戶界面工具包，適用於Sketch💎。

previous.excerpt: Mindstamp is the interactive video solution you've been looking for! Add Buttons, Questions, Hotspots, Branching. Use conditional logic and variables to create dynamic, personalized experiences. Capture data from every view. Simple, fast, and easy to use ✌🏼
previous.title: Mindstamp 2.0 - Make any video interactive in seconds 👁

localize.description: Mindstamp是您一直在寻找的互动视频解决方案! 添加按钮，问题，热点，分支。使用条件逻辑和变量来创建动态的、个性化的体验。从每个视图中捕捉数据。简单、快速、易于使用✌🏼。
localize.tagline: Jedes Video in Sekundenschnelle interaktiv machen 👁

localize.description: Mindstamp是您一直在尋找的互動視頻解決方案! 添加按鈕，問題，熱點，分支。使用條件邏輯和變量來創建動態的、個性化的體驗。從每個視圖中捕捉數據。簡單、快速、易於使用✌🏼。
localize.tagline: Jedes Video in Sekundenschnelle interaktiv machen 👁

next.excerpt: Think of Enlightn as your performance and security consultant. 120 automated checks that “review” your code, server configurations and more to provide actionable recommendations on improving your Laravel app’s performance and security.
next.title: Enlightn for Laravel - Personalized recommendations for improving your Laravel code

localize.description: 将Enlightn视为您的性能和安全顾问。120项自动检查可以 "审查 "你的代码, 服务器配置和更多, 以提供可操作的建议来提高你的Laravel应用程序的性能和安全性.
localize.tagline: 个性化的建议来改善你的Laravel代码

localize.description: 將Enlightn視爲您的性能和安全顧問。120項自動檢查可以 "審查 "你的代碼, 服務器配置和更多, 以提供可操作的建議來提高你的Laravel應用程序的性能和安全性.
localize.tagline: 個性化的建議來改善你的Laravel代碼
